title: Ananda Life Athena Spiritual Calm Aromatherapy Roller Ball 10ml
cleaned_text: Description Grounding and calming Athena, aims to enhance your divine connection. An ideal support in quieting the mind for meditation, with a centring effect to bring you to the here and now. Encourage peace and satisfaction in one's self with Athena, goddess of wisdom. Unlike traditional synthetic fragrances that weigh down your body with toxic chemicals, our Aromatherapy Pulse Point essential oil blends contain ingredients that can positively affect your mood and emotions by communicating with your body and senses through your skin to give you an experience as nature intended. Made in Byron Bay. Aromatic Description: A Rich rosy floral aroma with a warm musk undertone. How to use: Ingredients: Vegan, 100% Natural Oils Blend, Toxin Free. Roll the Pulse Point Roller on wrists, temples and behind the ears to activate the blend. Rose Maroc: emotional recovery, Rose: soothing and relaxing, Amber: quiet the mind and ground yourself, blended in skin loving Coconut Oil.
